service.method: UPDATE SCODE SET CHANGE_USER_ID = ${CHANGE_USER_ID}, CHANGE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), CHANGE_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), USE_FLAG = ${USE_FLAG}, TEXT2 = ${TEXT2}, TEXT1 = ${TEXT1}, TEXT3 = ${TEXT3}, TEXT4 = ${TEXT4}, TEXT5 = ${TEXT5}, TEXT6 = ${TEXT6}, TEXT7 = ${TEXT7} WHERE TYPE = ${TYPE} AND CODE = ${CODE} AND HOUSE_CODE = ${HOUSE_CODE}
SELECT TO_CHAR(COUNT(CODE)) as cnt FROM SCODE WHERE TYPE IN ('M040', 'M041', 'M042', 'M122') AND HOUSE_CODE = ${HOUSE_CODE} AND SUBSTR( CODE, 0, LENGTH(${CODE}) ) = ${CODE} AND CODE NOT IN (${CODE})

SELECT USE_FLAG, TEXT3, CODE, TEXT2, TEXT1, TEXT4, TEXT5, GETICOMCODE1('100', 'M051', TEXT5) AS STA_NAME, TEXT6, TEXT7 FROM SCODE WHERE TYPE = ${TYPE} AND HOUSE_CODE = ${HOUSE_CODE} AND SUBSTR( CODE, 0, LENGTH(${CODE}) ) = ${CODE}

UPDATE SCODE SET CHANGE_USER_ID = ${CHANGE_USER_ID}, CHANGE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), CHANGE_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), TEXT2 = ${TEXT2}, TEXT1 = ${TEXT1}, TEXT4 = ${TEXT4}, TEXT5 = ${TEXT5}, TEXT6 = ${TEXT6}, TEXT7 = ${TEXT7}, USE_FLAG = ${USE_FLAG} WHERE TYPE = ${TYPE} AND CODE = ${CODE} AND TEXT3 = ${TEXT3} AND HOUSE_CODE = ${HOUSE_CODE}

SELECT USE_FLAG, TEXT3, TEXT4, CODE, TEXT1, TEXT2, TEXT5, TEXT6, TEXT7 FROM ICOMCODE <OPT=F,S> WHERE TEXT3 = ? </OPT> <OPT=F,S> AND TEXT4 = ? </OPT> AND HOUSE_CODE = '#house_code#' <OPT=F,S> AND TYPE = ? </OPT> AND STATUS != 'D'

UPDATE SCODE SET CHANGE_USER_ID = ${CHANGE_USER_ID}, CHANGE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), CHANGE_TIME = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), USE_FLAG = ${USE_FLAG}, TEXT3 = ${TEXT3}, TEXT4 = ${TEXT4}, TEXT1 = ${TEXT1}, TEXT2 = ${TEXT2}, TEXT5 = ${TEXT5}, TEXT6 = ${TEXT6}, TEXT7 = ${TEXT7} WHERE TYPE = ${TYPE} AND HOUSE_CODE = ${HOUSE_CODE} AND CODE = ${CODE}
select count(*) AS CNT from scode where house_code = ${house_code} and type = ${type} --and status != 'D' and code = ${item_type}

INSERT INTO SCODE ( HOUSE_CODE, TYPE, CODE, LANGUAGE, ADD_DATE, ADD_TIME, ADD_USER_ID, CHANGE_DATE, CHANGE_TIME, CHANGE_USER_ID, FLAG, SORT_SEQ, USE_FLAG, IF_FLAG, TEXT1, TEXT2, TEXT3, TEXT4, TEXT5, TEXT6, TEXT7, TEXT8, DEL_FLAG, ACC_DATE ) VALUES( ${HOUSE_CODE}, ${TYPE}, ${CODE}, 'KO', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'),
TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), ${USER_ID}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), ${USER_ID},
NULL, 1, ${USE_FLAG}, 'N', ${TEXT1},
${TEXT2}, ${TEXT3}, ${TEXT4}, ${TEXT5}, ${TEXT6},
${TEXT7}, NULL, NULL, NULL )
select count(*) from icomcode where house_code = '#house_code#' <OPT=F,S> and type = ? </OPT> <OPT=F,S> and text3 = ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> and text4 = ? </OPT>

INSERT INTO SCODE ( HOUSE_CODE, TYPE, CODE, LANGUAGE, ADD_DATE, ADD_TIME, ADD_USER_ID, CHANGE_DATE, CHANGE_TIME, CHANGE_USER_ID, FLAG, SORT_SEQ, USE_FLAG, IF_FLAG, TEXT1, TEXT2, TEXT3, TEXT4, TEXT5, TEXT6, TEXT7, TEXT8, DEL_FLAG, ACC_DATE ) VALUES( ${HOUSE_CODE}, ${TYPE}, ${CODE}, 'KO', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'),
TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), ${USER_ID}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), ${USER_ID},
NULL, 1, ${USE_FLAG}, 'N', ${TEXT1},
${TEXT2}, ${TEXT3}, ${TEXT4}, ${TEXT5}, ${TEXT6},
${TEXT7}, NULL, NULL, NULL )
SELECT USE_FLAG, TEXT3, TEXT4, CODE, TEXT1, TEXT2, TEXT5, TEXT6, TEXT7 FROM SCODE WHERE TEXT3 = ${TEXT3} AND TEXT4 = ${TEXT4} AND HOUSE_CODE = ${HOUSE_CODE} AND TYPE = ${TYPE}
SELECT ${ITEM_CODE} || LPAD(NVL(COUNT(0), 0) + 1, 3, '0') AS CLASS FROM SCODE WHERE HOUSE_CODE = ${HOUSE_CODE} AND TYPE = ${TYPE} AND SUBSTR( CODE, 0, LENGTH(${ITEM_CODE}) ) = ${ITEM_CODE}
select NVL(TEXT3,'X'), NVL(TEXT4,'X') FROM ICOMCODE WHERE HOUSE_CODE = '#house_code#' <OPT=F,S> AND TYPE = ? </OPT> AND STATUS != 'D' <OPT=F,S> AND CODE = ? </OPT>
select NVL(text3,'X'), NVL(text4,'X'), NVL(text5,'X') from icomcode where house_code = '#house_code#' <OPT=F,S> and type = ? </OPT> and status != 'D' <OPT=F,S> and code = ? </OPT>

INSERT INTO SCODE ( HOUSE_CODE, TYPE, CODE, LANGUAGE, ADD_DATE, ADD_TIME, ADD_USER_ID, CHANGE_DATE, CHANGE_TIME, CHANGE_USER_ID, FLAG, SORT_SEQ, USE_FLAG, IF_FLAG, TEXT1, TEXT2, TEXT3, TEXT4, TEXT5, TEXT6, TEXT7, TEXT8, DEL_FLAG, ACC_DATE ) VALUES( ${HOUSE_CODE}, ${TYPE}, ${CODE}, 'KO', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'),
TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), ${USER_ID}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), ${USER_ID},
NULL, 1, ${USE_FLAG}, 'N', ${TEXT1},
${TEXT2}, ${TEXT3}, ${TEXT4}, ${TEXT5}, ${TEXT6},
${TEXT7}, NULL, NULL, NULL )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ICOMMCPM WHERE HOUSE_CODE = '#house_code#' <OPT=F,S> AND MATERIAL_CLASS1 = ? </OPT>

SELECT M.PURCHASE_LOCATION as area_code, GETICOMCODE2(M.HOUSE_CODE,'M039',M.PURCHASE_LOCATION) AS area_name, M.CTRL_CODE as ctrl_code, M.CTRL_TYPE as ctrl_type, M.COMPANY_CODE as company_code, P.CTRL_NAME_LOC FROM ICOMBACO P, ICOMMCPM M WHERE M.HOUSE_CODE = ${HOUSE_CODE} AND P.HOUSE_CODE = M.HOUSE_CODE AND M.MATERIAL_CLASS1 = ${MATERIAL_CLASS1} AND P.CTRL_TYPE = ${CTRL_TYPE} AND P.CTRL_CODE = M.CTRL_CODE AND P.COMPANY_CODE = M.COMPANY_CODE
SELECT CTRL_PERSON_ID FROM ICOMBACP where house_code = ${HOUSE_CODE} and company_code = ${COMPANY_CODE} and ctrl_type = 'P' and ctrl_code = ${CTRL_CODE}

INSERT INTO ICOMMCPM ( MATERIAL_CLASS1, PURCHASE_LOCATION, CTRL_TYPE, CTRL_CODE, COMPANY_CODE, ADD_USER_ID, ADD_DATE, ADD_TIME, CHANGE_USER_ID, CHANGE_DATE, CHANGE_TIME, HOUSE_CODE ) VALUES( ${MATERIAL_CLASS1}, ${PURCHASE_LOCATION}, ${CTRL_TYPE}, ${CTRL_CODE}, ${COMPANY_CODE},
${ADD_USER_ID}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), ${ADD_USER_ID}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'),
TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), ${HOUSE_CODE} )

select '' as pr_type, a.text3 as code3, (select text2 from icomcode where house_code='#house_code#' and type = 'M040' and code = a.text3) as text3, a.text4 as code4, (select text2 from icomcode where house_code='#house_code#' and type = 'M041' and code = a.text4) as text4, a.code as code5, (select text2 from icomcode where house_code='#house_code#' and type = 'M042' and code = a.code) as text5, a.code, a.text2, a.text1, a.use_flag, a.sort_seq from icomcode a where a.house_code = '#house_code#' and a.type = 'M042' <OPT=S,S> and text3 = ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> and text4 = ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> and code = ? </OPT> <OPT=S,S> and text2 like '%' || ? || '%' </OPT> <OPT=S,S> and upper(text1) like upper('%' || ? || '%') </OPT> and a.status <> 'D' order by a.code

select use_flag, text3, geticomcode1(house_code, 'M040', text3) as text3_name, text4, geticomcode1(house_code, 'M041', text4) as text4_name, text5, geticomcode1(house_code, 'M042', text5) as text5_name, code, text1, text2, text6, text7 from scode where 1=1 and text3 = ${text3} and text4 = ${text4} and text5 = ${text5} and house_code = ${house_code} and type = ${type}

INSERT INTO SCODE ( HOUSE_CODE, TYPE, CODE, LANGUAGE, ADD_DATE, ADD_TIME, ADD_USER_ID, CHANGE_DATE, CHANGE_TIME, CHANGE_USER_ID, FLAG, SORT_SEQ, USE_FLAG, IF_FLAG, TEXT1, TEXT2, TEXT3, TEXT4, TEXT5, TEXT6, TEXT7, TEXT8, DEL_FLAG, ACC_DATE ) VALUES( ${HOUSE_CODE}, ${TYPE}, ${CODE}, 'KO', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'),
TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), ${USER_ID}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), ${USER_ID},
NULL, 1, ${USE_FLAG}, 'N', ${TEXT1},
${TEXT2}, ${TEXT3}, ${TEXT4}, ${TEXT5}, ${TEXT6},
${TEXT7}, NULL, NULL, NULL )

update scode set change_user_id = ${change_user_id}, change_date = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), change_time = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), use_flag = ${use_flag}, text3 = ${text3}, text4 = ${text4}, text5 = ${text5}, text1 = ${text1}, text2 = ${text2}, text6 = ${text6}, text7 = ${text7} where type = ${type} and house_code = ${house_code} and code = ${code}
